PHRASE.LANG: kName
5-Carat Diamond Ring (Men)
Bague diamant 5 carats (Homme)
5-Karat-Diamantenring (für Männer)
Anello con diamante 5 carati
Anillo de diamante de 5 quilates (Hombre)
５カラットのダイヤのリング（男性）
5캐럿짜리 다이아 반지 (남성)
5-Carat Diamond Ring (Men)
5卡鑽戒（男用）
5克拉鑽戒（男用）
5 Carat Diamond Ring (Male)
kDesc
A large 5-carat diamond ring meant for two people who have pledged themselves to one another for all time. [#Legal]
Une imposante bague en diamant 5 carats pour un couple qui se promet un amour éternel. [#Legal]
Ein großer 5-Karat-Diamantenring für ein Paar, das sich gegenseitig die Ewigkeit versprochen hat.[#Legal]
Un vistoso anello con diamante 5 carati.\nPer coppie che hanno giurato di\nvivere insieme per sempre. [#Legal]
Gran anillo de diamantes de 5 quilates para una pareja que se ha prometido para la eternidad el uno al otro. [#Legal]
永遠を約束した二人のための、５カラットの大きなダイヤの指輪。[#Legal]
영원을 약속한 두 사람을 위한 5캐럿짜리 커다란 다이아몬드 반지. [#Legal]
A large 5-carat diamond ring meant for two people who have pledged themselves to one another for all time. [#Legal]
5卡大鑽戒，供許下永恆承諾的兩人佩戴。[#Legal]
5克拉大鑽戒，供許下永恆承諾的兩人佩戴。[#Legal]
A large, 5 carat diamond ring for a couple who have promised eternity to each other. [#Legal]
